title: 279. Why Is My Life So Hard?
description: Most of us feel we face more headwinds and obstacles than everyone else — which breeds resentment. We also undervalue the tailwinds that help us — which leaves us ungrateful and unhappy. How can we avoid this trap?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
